apple_vendor_description: This depiction of two people holding hands, with both individuals rendered in a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, showcases a tender and supportive connection. Apple's design emphasizes the gentle overlap of the hands, with smooth, rounded fingers and subtle highlights that suggest warmth and intimacy through realistic lighting. The soft gradients contribute to a feeling of unity and partnership, making this emoji on Apple devices a beautiful representation of friendship, romance, or solidarity.
